summary: Place your Staff on Magnus on the wall properly
descriptionHtml:
[size=40][color=#0000EE]Staff of Magnus Plaque[/color][/size]


This mod will add a plaque to the Arch-Mage\'s quarters in the College of Winterhold. It appears after main College of Winterhold questline. The plaque is blue, as opposed to usual red, and may be used only to hold Staff of Magnus. You will find it near your bed in the already mentioned quarters.

[size=15]Manual installation[/size]
Extract everything to your Skyrim\\Data folder.

[size=15]Known bugs:[/size] 
[list] [*]Sometimes it can be tricky to get the \"Activate Weapon Rack\" message to appear, but it can be done (see pictures). [/list]

[size=15]Possible bugs:[/size]
Please note that these are only theoretical and should not actually appear.
[list] [*]The plaque appears before finishing the main questline of College of Winterhold. 
[*]The plaque won\'t appear after finishing the main questline of the College of Winterhold. 
[*]Plaque can hold other items, not only Staff of Magnus. [/list]

If you encounter any of these bugs, feel free to contact me via [url=mailto:mutak94@gmail.com]email[/url] or [url=https://www.facebook.com/augustin.mutak] my Facebook page[/url].
author: Mutak94
